full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'PHAGS PA SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA YON TAN RIN PO CHE SDUD PA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @064B 'PHAGS MA BCOM LDAN 'DAS MA SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA BRGYAD STONG PA'I RJES SU 'BRANG BA'I BCOM LDAN 'DAS MA YON TAN RIN PO CHE BSDUD PA TSIGS SU BCAD PA RDZOGS SO,, ,,DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA KHYED SKU CI 'DRA DANG, ,ZHES PA NAS, CHOS DANG BKRA SHIS 'PHEL BAR MDZAD DU GSOL, ,STON PA 'JIG RTEN KHAMS SU 'BYON PA DANG, ,BSTAN PA NYI 'OD BZHIN DU GSAL BA DANG, ,BSTAN 'DZIN PHU NU BZHUN DU MTHUN PA YIS, ,BSTAN PA YUN RING GNAS PA'I BKRA @065A *, ,SHIS SHOG , ,, *, ,AOm SVASTI, RGYAL BA'I GSUNG RAB KUN GYI RAB DANG PHUL, ,SHER PHYIN MDO MCHOG SDUD PA'I GLEGS BAM 'DI, ,RAB DKAR DANG LDAN CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYIS, ,CHOS KYI SBYIN MCHOG RGYA CHER SPEL PHYIR DU, ,SPAR DU BSKRUN PA'I DGE MTHUS RGYAL BSTAN DAR, ,DPAL LDAN BLA MA'I ZHABS PAD BRTAN PA DANG, ,PHA MA GTZO BYAS 'GRO KUN MA LUS PA, ,RING MIN BYANG CHEN MYUR DU THOB GYUR CIG , ,,)
